greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: A051731 * A051953^(n-k) * 0^(n-k), 1 <= k <= n.
comment: n-th row = (p-1) zeros followed by 1, iff n is prime.
For T(n,k), k divides n if k not = 0.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A051731 * A051953^(n-k); where A051953^(n-k) = an infinite lower triangular matrix with A051953 (0, 1, 1, 2, 1, 4, 1, 4, 3, 6, 1, 8,...) in the main diagonal and the rest zeros. A051731 = inverse Mobius transform.
